amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Energy to fund at least one coal gasification project from research and development funds contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 107-178 to ensure that there is no "back-loading" of clean coal project funding to the last year(s) of the 10 year authorization period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
